title: Bar Backlog: Slow Friday Ticket Times
system_mod: Emphasize throughput and collision reduction; tighten pass-line and handoff.
venue_context: Neighborhood cocktail bar, 80 seats, single service well + 1 guest well. POS at bar ends. Recent complaints about 12–15 min ticket times between 8–10pm.
prompt: We’re seeing a Friday night backlog—drinks are taking too long and the well looks jammed. Can you redesign our station map and rail load-out to speed things up without adding staff?
